resources.string: There is no encryption for this dialog. All messages are stored on the server in unencrypted form and are accessible from any authorized device.
This dialog uses hybrid encryption. All messages are encrypted with a unique secret dialogue AES key and stored on the server. Available on any authorized device.

This dialog uses hybrid end-to-end encryption. Each message is encrypted with its own unique secret AES key, which is encrypted with the user`s public RSA key. Messages are stored on the server only until they are received by the user. After receiving the message, it is deleted from the server and stored only in local storage. This dialog is available ONLY on this device and ONLY for the current session.

This action will delete all local data. All private conversations cannot be restored after that. The application will close and re-authorization will be required. Use only if the application does not work correctly.
Here you can change your name on the messenger. It will be visible to all users. Name must contains at least 6 characters.

Here you can change your email address. The new address will be used for authorization and password recovery. A password confirmation is required to change the email. Password must contains at least 6 characters.
Here you can change your password. The new password will be used for authorization. A password confirmation is required to this action.
Select user to dialog by tap, or select multiple users by long tap and press start new chat
Click here for change your name
